name: Launching The Assault
Lore: 'By recruiting the Mon Calamari, a race of master shipwrights, the Rebel starfleet gained capital starships rivaling the dreaded Imperial Star Destroyers.',
Text: 'Deploy on any system. Once per game, may take Home One into from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Your Force drains are +1 at battleground systems where you have a Star Cruiser piloted by a character. Effecte canceled when Rendezvous Point on table. (Immune to Alter.)',
